thread.title: Miss amanda quinn
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Miss amanda quinn

author: Miss amanda quinn
title: Miss amanda quinn
text: lifestyle has excellent next day delivery..the quality and style of there footwear and clothing are super..also the staff are very helpful and quick..this shop is my favorite has so much more variety of everything than any other sports shop .well done! to all at lifestyle!! im a very happy customer 😊👍👍👍👍👍
